vote.title: Authorize a construction contract for the construction of Alley Reconstruction Group 17-1304 (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Jeske Construction Company, lowest responsible bidder of three - Not to exceed $2,714,861.00 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($1,672,196.00), Water Utilities Capital Improvement D Funds ($173,985.00), Wastewater Utilities Capital Improvement E Funds ($807,190.00), Water Utilities Capital Construction Funds ($11,165.00), and Wastewater Utilities Capital Construction Funds ($50,325.00)
